A?
V?

Will is play on PS3?  As it is, no, you need MKV2VOB to covert it.  If it has Cinavia, and you do not have a DTS receiver and have to use AC3 Audio, then NO it still won't play.  As of now, the PS3 can't detect Cinavia in a DTS stream, but they're working on it...  Mine is, and will stay in CFW 3.55, so I won't get any update if that were to change.

Anything made by SONY, will have Cinavia. There used to be a Wiki with a list of movies that have it, but someone removed all that.

@The__dude21
Or you can also just get the latest version of PS3 Media Server if you have your PS3 hooked up to your home network, and you can stream this from your computer to your PS3.
